Text: Thanks for a great upload, but PLEASE can you seed this for a while as we are all stuck!

Not a very good one. Sure it has 2.0 and 5.1 support but it lacks many parts. The content just skips from one part to another and its the uploads fault I think (the player plays normally, PC and soundcard good etc)

I am waiting forever for a decent music CD or even better a DVD with the actual footage. I watched it live and it was such a beautiful experience.

I'm going to stop seeding this, and will upload the video next. There are some glitches in the video due to the local cable company, but they are minor.

@flak77: I have no idea what you are talking about. If you're burning it to a CD to listen to, make sure you write the tracks in the proper order. Seems to work fine on my end.
